column2: I was a little surprised that they don't seem to offer more traditional sushi
column3: I asked if their Ebi Tempura came with the shrimp head
column4: and was informed that it wasn't so I asked if they served Ebi with the head at all on their menu... nope they don't. Their Wagyu beef was American Wagyu beef
column5: which is drastically different from A5 Japanese true Wagyu beef.
